misc: Operates the Hector organization's digital media properties
Gotten increasingly close to winning the Hector Trophée but hasn't quite gotten it done yet
biography: Lasse, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his unwavering dedication to the sport and his integral role behind the scenes. As the operator of the Hector organization's digital media properties, he ensures that fans around the world stay connected to the tournament.

Representing Tapiola Golf, Lasse's participation in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his ninth appearance in the competition. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor trophy have eluded him thus far, those who know him can attest to his relentless pursuit of excellence on the course.

Despite not having secured a victory yet, Lasse's passion for the game and commitment to the Hector Trophée remain as strong as ever. He has gotten increasingly close to winning the Hector Trophée but hasn't quite gotten it done yet, and his fellow competitors know not to underestimate his resolve.
